016package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service;
017
018import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
019import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
020import androidx.room.Database;
021import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
022import androidx.room.TypeConverter;
023import androidx.room.TypeConverters;
024import androidx.sqlite.db.SupportSQLiteDatabase;
025import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.dao.UserDao;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.entity.User;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service.LocalDatabase.Converters;
028import java.time.Instant;
029
030/**
031 * Defines a connection to a local Room/SQLite database, All database reads/writes are performed
032 * using data-access object (DAO) instances obtained from the singleton instance of this class.
033 */
034@Database(
035    entities = {User.class},
036    version = 1
037)
038@TypeConverters({Converters.class})
039public abstract class LocalDatabase extends RoomDatabase { // TODO Change to more app-specific name.
040
041  /**  Name of SQLite database file. */
042  public static final String NAME = "starter"; // TODO Change to more app-specific value.
043
044  LocalDatabase() {
045    // Package-private constructor to avoid automatic HTML generation for Javadocs.
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Returns an instance of a {@link UserDao} implementation, providing persistence operations on
050   * instances of the {@link User} entity class.
051   */
052  public abstract UserDao getUserDao();
053
054  // TODO Declare abstract accessors (aka getters) for other DAOs used in this project.
055
056  /**
057   * Defines converters for otherwise unsupported types (initially, just {@link Instant}) to one of
058   * those supported by Room/SQLite.
059   */
060  public static class Converters {
061
062    /**
063     * Returns the specified {@link Instant} {@code value} as a {@link Long}, corresponding to the
064     * number of milliseconds elapsed since {@code 1970-01-01 00:00:00+00:00} encapsulated within
065     * {@code value}. When {@code value} is {@code null}, this method returns {@code null} as well.
066     *
067     * @param value Input {@link Instant}
068     * @return Epoch milliseconds encapsulated in {@code value}.
069     */
070    @TypeConverter
071    @Nullable
072    public static Long toLong(@Nullable Instant value) {
073      return (value != null) ? value.toEpochMilli() : null;
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * Returns an {@link Instant} instance containing the specified {@link Long} {@code value} epoch
078     * milliseconds. That is, {@code value} is interpreted as a number of milliseconds elapsed since
079     * {@code 1970-01-01 00:00:00+00:00}, and the corresponding {@link Instant} is returned. When
080     * {@code value} is {@code null}, this method returns {@code null} as well.
081     *
082     * @param value Epoch milliseconds.
083     * @return {@link Instant} corresponding to {@code value}.
084     */
085    @TypeConverter
086    @Nullable
087    public static Instant toInstant(@Nullable Long value) {
088      return (value != null) ? Instant.ofEpochMilli(value) : null;
089    }
090
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Implements methods to be invoked on key database events.
095   */
096  public static class Callback extends RoomDatabase.Callback {
097
098    @Override
099    public void onCreate(@NonNull SupportSQLiteDatabase db) {
100      super.onCreate(db);
101      // TODO Obtain DAO instances from database, and use them to perform any required preloads, e.g.
102      //  LocalDatabase database = LocalDatabase.getInstance();
103      //  etc.
104    }
105
106  }
107
108}
